content: ♥chain 2 hdc2tog inside back dcf f/\b ▲f row 20 cc over same tip as hdc2tog just ▲f-l ▲f ▲f-l f/\b ▲f inside back dcf ▲f f/d \f-l 1 1 2 1 completed and tip of next f/\b b/\f ▲f b/\f r -▲f ▲fx3 b/\f f/\b ▲fx3 r - 1 1 triangle ♥ repeat from ♥ to ♥ 9 more ▲f r -▲f ▲f b/\f f/\b f/d \f ▲f f/\b 1 2 times chain 2 hdc2tog over same tip turn work turn work as hdc2tog just completed and tip of corner triangle half_double_crochet in same right side right side corner place smb † row 17 mc row 21 mc c side a half_double_crochet in same tip place move cc to front of work move cc to front of work sma * outside stitch dcb ▲f ▲bx2 outside stitch dcb ▲fx2 ▲fx4 repeat from * to * steps a to c once ▲fx2 ▲f ▲fx2 ▲f ▲fx2 ▲f ▲fx4 ▲fx2 ▲b then from * to † steps a and b once ▲f ▲fx2 ▲bx2 ▲f ▲b row 21 cc join with slip_stitch in beg half_double_crochet fasten_off row 17 cc inside front dcb b/\f ▲b weave in ends inside front dcb ▲bx2 ▲b-l 1 b/d 2 \b x2 ▲b ▲f ▲b 11 chain-2 sps made on each side ▲b b/\f b/d \b b/\f b/d \b x2 ▲b f/\b b/\f 2 2 half snowflake motif b/d \b f/\b b/d \b f/\b 2 2 turn work ▲b r -▲b ▲bx2 b/\f follow instructions for snowflake 1 wrong side motif through row 11-cc fasten_off turn work cc row 22 mc wrong side move cc to back of work row 12 mc row 18 mc outside stitch ▲fx2 ▲fx3 outside stitch dcf ▲b ▲bx2 move cc to back of work ▲fx2 ▲fx4 ▲fx4 ▲fx2 ▲b ▲bx2 ▲bx2 ▲b ▲bx2 ▲fx3 ▲fx2 outside stitch outside stitch dcf ▲bx3 ▲bx2 ▲b ▲f ▲b ▲b ▲b ▲b ▲b ▲b turn work row 22 cc ▲bx2 ▲bx3 ▲f inside back dcf ▲fx10 f/\b border first half snowflake - rs row 18 cc fasten_off cc working back across last row tch inside back dcf ▲f-l 1 ▲f turn work does not count as st half_double_crochet single_crochet in ▲f-l 1 ▲fx8 r 1 -▲f ▲f same st as tch made chain 2 single_crochet in top r 1 -▲f f/\b right side of next triangle mesh st 22 times row 23 mc chain 2 single_crochet half_double_crochet in outside stitch turn work outside stitch dcb ▲bx11 ▲b a side b half_double_crochet in same st place right side smb hdc2tog see first snowflake do not turn work continue to row 19 mc border over same st and tip of border move cc to front of work next triangle chain 2 hdc2tog over border first snowflake same tip as hdc2tog just completed outside stitch dcb ▲f ▲fx2 working into the tips of triangles and tip of next triangle 10 times ▲fx9 ▲fx2 ▲f ▲b around outside edge of snowflake chain 2 hdc2tog over same tip as
